title: Walk to enemy nexus at start of game bug?
body:
So I was going to play a game as Irelia just before but I disconnected during champion select as my internet dropped so when I logged back into LoL, I saw that it did not make me dodge queue and the game had started. So I joined in the game and the moment I tried to move to top lane, I started walking to the enemy nexus and couldn't stop moving unless I pressed S. I walked all the way up to our outer mid turret before I decided to ALT-F4 and when I connected I was back in base and could move freely again. If I didn't do anything I surely would have been executed by the turret or given first blood.

Has anyone had this happen to them before? I have never seen anything like this before.

Also, I was not lagging at the time this happened a I had 60 ping and could see my allies moving, buying and talking just fine.

Edit: I found a video of what exactly happens from TheOddOne's stream about a month ago.
         https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6InUrePhrxM

replies.body:
I just found this happening to TheOddOne about a month ago, I guess i haven't gone crazy after all!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6InUrePhrxM
looks weird... odd one like whaaaat when he died
